audioText: Chaque jour qui passe nous rapproche un peu plus de nos objectifs professionnels et personnels.
question: What does the speaker say about each passing day?
options: It brings us closer to our professional and personal goals.
It makes our goals more difficult to achieve.
It helps us forget about our goals.
explanation: The text states 'Chaque jour qui passe nous rapproche un peu plus de nos objectifs professionnels et personnels' - Each day that passes brings us a little closer to our professional and personal goals. 'Jour' emphasizes the daily progression toward achievements.
